item.title: Ethereum for computer scientists
item.description: On June 6th, 2022, I held a seminar at Università degli Studi di Milano about Ethereum: virtual currency, state machines, and programmable money. The presentation is about Ethereum from the point of view of a computer scientist. It discusses Ethereum’s global state, the consensus mechanism, smart contracts, ERC20, and more. The slides are publicly available (Google Sheets; PDF).
